attributes.action: Vaccinate British Citizens living in the UK  FIRST with the Covid 19 vaccine
attributes.additional_details: Protect British Citizens and taxpayers first in relation to the Covid 19 vaccination programme
attributes.background: To assure British citizens living in the UK that they will receive vaccinations FIRST and before others from other countries. To vaccinate the UK population FIRST and ENTIRELY before sending any vaccine abroad.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Stop pharmaceutical companies exporting UK made vaccines until UK contracts met
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572610
